text: Taylor Swift Here's Swift hiking... backwards? Yes, backwards. After this photo leaked, one fan on Tumblr wrote, ` ` It's like she's doing that test that police officers do to see if you're drunk or not.'' According to TODAY, Swift responded by posting a dancing ` ` Bridesmaids'' GIF that read, ` ` If I was drunk, would I be able to do this?'' She then explained that the real reason she walked backwards was because of the paparazzi : ` ` I saw the guy with the camera and wasn â€™ t in the mood so I hiked the whole trail backward and my security told me when to make turns. Ah, the tranquillity of the great outdoo - T
